title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

Each criterion is achieved independently.
descriptions: Response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the question.

Response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question. NOTE: To meet the requirement of “describe” in parts (a), (b), the response must offer a minimally accurate description of some aspect of ideas referenced by the image and some indication of how that idea relates to the topic of the prompt.

Response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question. NOTE: To meet the requirement of “describe” in parts (a), (b), the response must offer a minimally accurate description of some aspect of ideas referenced by the image and some indication of how that idea relates to the topic of the prompt.

Response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question. NOTE: To meet the requirement of “describe” in parts (a), (b), the response must offer a minimally accurate description of some aspect of ideas referenced by the image and some indication of how that idea relates to the topic of the prompt.
